Title: Relates to prohibiting certain payments and benefits to administrators under an individual contract
Summary: Prohibits an administrator employed through an individual contract with a school district or the state university of New York from receiving any additional payout, bonus renumeration, or benefits, including paid leaves or guaranteed faculty positions, upon the termination of such contract.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to prohibiting certain payments and benefits made to administrators
